strapiPost.title: Springdale to Host Red Bull Pump Track Championships in 2021
strapiPost.content:
On May 22, 2021, Springdale will host the final leg of the Red Bull UCI Pump Track World Championships circuit.

  • The region's Jones Center has a year-round ice arena, junior swimming pool, basketball court, fitness centre, indoor running track and a Velosolutions Pump Track, which hosted the first-ever Red Bull Pump Track World Championship Final in 2018. -Red Bull
  • Other destinations on the circuit include Argentina, New Zealand and China.
